non profit devs

Hello, my name is Jenaro Calviño and I'm the founder of non profit devs.

What is non profit devs?

It is a place where developers/designers, can contribute ad honorem to non profit organizations and/or where NGOs can ask for their projects to be carried out.

Am I a good fit?

Yes you are! We are not going to check your GitHub profile or your resume, in fact, the idea came to me at a time where I was a junior and thought a place like this would give me the opportunity to showcase my skills.

Contributing

If you like the idea and want to contribute you can check the website.

If you want to contribute on the website itself, you might want to check the repo where it is hosted, it is open source and we already had contributions.
